# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill (position (43.0, -82.0)) and a Chest (position (42.5, -83.5)).

### Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a Furnace (position (41.0, -82.0)).

### Inserter System at position (43.5, -80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter (position (43.5, -80.5)), a Chest (position (44.5, -81.5)), and another Chest (position (43.5, -79.5)).

### Storage at position (44.5, -81.5)
Consists of a Chest (position (44.5, -81.5)).

### Storage at position (45.5, -80.5)
Consists of a Chest (position (45.5, -80.5)).

### Storage at position (43.5, -79.5)
Consists of a Chest (position (43.5, -79.5)).


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items.
- Make sure the entity has enough fuel to perform the extraction.
- Check if the entity is waiting for source items before attempting to extract.

### Errors when using Burner Mining Drill
- Ensure the Burner Mining Drill has enough fuel to operate.
- Check if the chest at the drop position is full and empty it to continue mining.

### Errors when using Burner Inserter
- Ensure the inserter has enough space in the destination chest to place items.
- Check if the chest at the drop position is full and empty it to continue inserting items.
